bell_schedule.1: School starts at 8:00 AM. Morning recess is from 10:00 to 10:20 AM. Lunch is from 11:50 to 12:35    PM.  For Kindergarden to 3rd grader, and school ends at 2:05 PM. For 4th and 5th graders, school end at 2:35   PM.
bell_schedule.2: Tuesday is early dismissal.School starts at 8:00 AM. Morning recess is from 10:00 to 10:20 AM. Lunch is from 11:50 to 12:35 PM. School is dismissed at 1:30 pm
